column5: Hi! How can I help you
Hi ! Nice to meet you. To enter user details type 'user registration'
I'm a Virtual Assistant Bot to help you. My name is Alzheimer's Bot
I was made by Rupsa Meganaa Pranavi and Pratyush under the Guidance of Prof Chittaranjan Hota

column6: type 'call family1' to reach out to your primary contact. Type 'call family2' to reach out to your secondary contact.

column5: I'm sorry to hear that.Type 'call Doctor' and reach out to him immediately
You need to take Donepezil and Galantamine once a day. To order them type 'open medplus'
Enter patient details in the form name 'name of patient' and address 'address of patient'
